                    <p><strong>Business hours of reception: 24 hours</strong></p> <p>The enchanting Hotel Beausejour is located in Paris, among the vivid Quartier Bastille, the famous Père Lachaise cemetery and the Place de la République. It is thus the ideal starting point to explore all the wonderful Parisian sights.<br /> <br /> We provide single, double and twin rooms, each of them equipped en-suite with tub or shower. The soundproof accommodations furthermore feature satellite TV, desk and phone with alarm clock. Cots, extra beds and hairdryers are available on request. <br /> <br /> Further of the hotel’s amenities include a bar, a small lounge, a 24-hour reception, an internet point and a WLAN hot spot. The friendly and attentive staff is happy to provide you with information on Paris and its sights at all times.</p>
National Rating: This hotel has received its official star rating from the French Tourism Development Agency, ATOUT France. Know Before You Go: No pets and no service animals are allowed at this property. Fees: The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Fee for continental breakfast: EUR 9.50 per person (approximately) Crib (infant bed) fee: EUR 5 per night Rollaway beds are available for an additional fee The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Mandatory Fees and Taxes: You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the hotel: 
Reception hours:
Every day:	from 12:00 AM to 12:00 AM

Search for " " Cities Districts Regions Points of Interest Trade fair Stations Airports Hotels Hotel Chains Google Places Reason for the trip: Leisure Business Leisure HOTEL DE price guarantee The perfect hotel for your trip Filter by your desired criteria, such as price, location or guest ratings Business Exclusive Business Tariff Up to 30% discount Special additional service such as breakfast, WiFi or parking Arrival Check-out Rooms Persons Search Your travel dates: Rooms Persons Arrival Check-out Check availability Hotel description Hotel Beauséjour Business hours of reception: 24 hours The enchanting Hotel Beausejour is located in Paris, among the vivid Quartier Bastille, the famous Père Lachaise cemetery and the Place de la République. It is thus the ideal starting point to explore all the wonderful Parisian sights. We provide single, double and twin rooms, each of them equipped en-suite with tub or shower. The soundproof accommodations furthermore feature satellite TV, desk and phone with alarm clock. Cots, extra beds and hairdryers are available on request. Further of the hotel’s amenities include a bar, a small lounge, a 24-hour reception, an internet point and a WLAN hot spot. The friendly and attentive staff is happy to provide you with information on Paris and its sights at all times. National Rating: This hotel has received its official star rating from the French Tourism Development Agency, ATOUT France. Know Before You Go: No pets and no service animals are allowed at this property. Fees: The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Fee for continental breakfast: EUR 9.50 per person (approximately) Crib (infant bed) fee: EUR 5 per night Rollaway beds are available for an additional fee The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Mandatory Fees and Taxes: You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the hotel: Reception hours: Every day: from 12:00 AM to 12:00 AM Hotel data Number of floors 6, Total number of rooms 31, Number of single rooms 4, Number of double rooms 18, Number of rooms with air conditioning 4, Reception manned 24 hours a day, Earliest check-in 14:00, Latest check-out 11:00, Multilingual staff on hand 24 hours a day, Hotel, City hotel, No-smoking hotel, No-smoking room 31 Address Show map 71 Avenue Parmentier, 75011 Paris, France Distances Station (Paris - Gare de l’Est) 1.8 km City centre (Paris) 1.96 km Airport (Paris-Orly Airport (ORY)) 15.49 km More hotels in Paris Hotel Location The Hotel Beauséjour is located 2 kilometres from the centre of Paris. The Place de la République square and the Notre-Dame Cathedral can be reached quickly and easily on foot. The nearby Canal Saint Martin and the Parc de Belleville are perfect places to go for a long walk.
